name: Adventure of Arlo & Mini
description:
Adventure of Arlo & Mini is 3D adventure puzzle game. Two player will be able to play side by side on one screen. One will control the Arlo and another will control Arlo's pet Mini. They both have different abilities. So both player have to combine their abilities to solve puzzle. Here our goal is to help Arlo & Mini to return to their home safely.

Enjoy!!
